1: תִּקְע֨וּ <sup>8628 </sup> <n>Blow</n> שׁוֹפָ֜ר <sup>7782 </sup> <n>ye the trumpet</n> בְּצִיּ֗וֹן <sup>6726 </sup> <n>in Zion</n> וְהָרִ֙יעוּ֙ <sup>7321 </sup> <n>and sound an alarm</n> בְּהַ֣ר <sup>2022 </sup> <n>mountain</n> קָדְשִׁ֔י <sup>6944 </sup> <n>in my holy</n> יִרְגְּז֕וּ <sup>7264 </sup> <n>tremble</n> כֹּ֖ל <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> יֹשְׁבֵ֣י <sup>3427 </sup> <n>let all the inhabitants</n> הָאָ֑רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>of the land</n> כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>Surely</n> בָ֥א <sup>935 </sup> <n>cometh</n> יוֹם־ <sup>3117 </sup> <n>for the day</n> יְהוָ֖ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>of the LORD</n> כִּ֥י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>Surely</n> קָרֽוֹב׃ <sup>7138 </sup> <n>for [it is] nigh at hand</n>
2: י֧וֹם <sup>3117 </sup> <n>A day</n> חֹ֣שֶׁךְ <sup>2822 </sup> <n>of darkness</n> וַאֲפֵלָ֗ה <sup>653 </sup> <n>and of gloominess</n> י֤וֹם <sup>3117 </sup> <n>a day</n> עָנָן֙ <sup>6051 </sup> <n>of clouds</n> וַעֲרָפֶ֔ל <sup>6205 </sup> <n>and of thick darkness</n> כְּשַׁ֖חַר <sup>7837 </sup> <n>as the morning</n> פָּרֻ֣שׂ <sup>6566 </sup> <n>spread</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>over</n> הֶֽהָרִ֑ים <sup>2022 </sup> <n>upon the mountains</n> עַ֚ם <sup>5971 </sup> <n>people</n> רַ֣ב <sup>7227 </sup> <n>a great</n> וְעָצ֔וּם <sup>6099 </sup> <n>and a strong</n> כָּמֹ֗הוּ <sup>3644 </sup> <n>like</n> לֹ֤א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>Nor</n> נִֽהְיָה֙ <sup>1961 </sup> <n>there hath not been</n> מִן־ <sup>4480 </sup> <n>at</n> הָ֣עוֹלָ֔ם <sup>5769 </sup> <n>ever</n> וְאַֽחֲרָיו֙ <sup>310 </sup> <n>after</n> לֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>Nor</n> יוֹסֵ֔ף <sup>3254 </sup> <n>the like neither shall be any more</n> עַד־ <sup>5704 </sup> <n>against</n> שְׁנֵ֖י <sup>8141 </sup> <n>it [even] to the years</n> דּ֥וֹר <sup>1755 </sup> <n>of many</n> וָדֽוֹר׃ <sup>1755 </sup> <n>generations</n>
3: לְפָנָיו֙ <sup>6440 </sup> <n>before</n> אָ֣כְלָה <sup>398 </sup> <n>devoureth</n> אֵ֔שׁ <sup>784 </sup> <n>A fire</n> וְאַחֲרָ֖יו <sup>310 </sup> <n>them and behind</n> תְּלַהֵ֣ט <sup>3857 </sup> <n>burneth</n> לֶֽהָבָ֑ה <sup>3852 </sup> <n>them a flame</n> כְּגַן־ <sup>1588 </sup> <n>[is] as the garden</n> עֵ֨דֶן <sup>5731 </sup> <n>of Eden</n> הָאָ֜רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>the land</n> לְפָנָ֗יו <sup>6440 </sup> <n>before</n> וְאַֽחֲרָיו֙ <sup>310 </sup> <n>them and behind</n> מִדְבַּ֣ר <sup>4057 </sup> <n>wilderness</n> שְׁמָמָ֔ה <sup>8077 </sup> <n>them a desolate</n> וְגַם־ <sup>1571 </sup> <n>all</n> פְּלֵיטָ֖ה <sup>6413 </sup> <n>yea and nothing shall escape</n> לֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>and nothing</n> הָ֥יְתָה <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> לּֽוֹ׃
4: כְּמַרְאֵ֥ה <sup>4758 </sup> <n>The appearance</n> סוּסִ֖ים <sup>5483 </sup> <n>of horses</n> מַרְאֵ֑הוּ <sup>4758 </sup> <n>of them [is] as the appearance</n> וּכְפָרָשִׁ֖ים <sup>6571 </sup> <n>and as horsemen</n> כֵּ֥ן <sup>3651 </sup> <n>so</n> יְרוּצֽוּן׃ <sup>7323 </sup> <n>so shall they run</n>
5: כְּק֣וֹל <sup>6963 </sup> <n>Like the noise</n> מַרְכָּב֗וֹת <sup>4818 </sup> <n>of chariots</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>on</n> רָאשֵׁ֤י <sup>7218 </sup> <n>on the tops</n> הֶֽהָרִים֙ <sup>2022 </sup> <n>of mountains</n> יְרַקֵּד֔וּן <sup>7540 </sup> <n>shall they leap</n> כְּקוֹל֙ <sup>6963 </sup> <n>like the noise</n> לַ֣הַב <sup>3851 </sup> <n>of a flame</n> אֵ֔שׁ <sup>784 </sup> <n>of fire</n> אֹכְלָ֖ה <sup>398 </sup> <n>that devoureth</n> קָ֑שׁ <sup>7179 </sup> <n>the stubble</n> כְּעַ֣ם <sup>5971 </sup> <n>people</n> עָצ֔וּם <sup>6099 </sup> <n>as a strong</n> עֱר֖וּךְ <sup>6186 </sup> <n>array</n> מִלְחָמָֽה׃ <sup>4421 </sup> <n>set in battle</n>
6: מִפָּנָ֖יו <sup>6440 </sup> <n>Before their face</n> יָחִ֣ילוּ <sup>2342 </sup> <n>shall be much pained</n> עַמִּ֑ים <sup>5971 </sup> <n>the people</n> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>All</n> פָּנִ֖ים <sup>6440 </sup> <n>all faces</n> קִבְּצ֥וּ <sup>6908 </sup> <n>shall gather</n> פָארֽוּר׃ <sup>6289 </sup> <n>blackness</n>
7: כְּגִבּוֹרִ֣ים <sup>1368 </sup> <n>like mighty men</n> יְרֻצ֔וּן <sup>7323 </sup> <n>They shall run</n> כְּאַנְשֵׁ֥י <sup>376 </sup> <n>every one</n> מִלְחָמָ֖ה <sup>4421 </sup> <n>of war</n> יַעֲל֣וּ <sup>5927 </sup> <n>they shall climb</n> חוֹמָ֑ה <sup>2346 </sup> <n>the wall</n> וְאִ֤ישׁ <sup>376 </sup> <n>each</n> בִּדְרָכָיו֙ <sup>1870 </sup> <n>on his ways</n> יֵֽלֵכ֔וּן <sup>1980 </sup> <n>march</n> וְלֹ֥א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>Nor</n> יְעַבְּט֖וּן <sup>5670 </sup> <n>and they shall not break</n> אֹרְחוֹתָֽם׃ <sup>734 </sup> <n>their ranks</n>
8: וְאִ֤ישׁ <sup>376 </sup> <n>Neither shall one</n> אָחִיו֙ <sup>251 </sup> <n>another</n> לֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> יִדְחָק֔וּן <sup>1766 </sup> <n>thrust</n> גֶּ֥בֶר <sup>1397 </sup> <n>every one</n> בִּמְסִלָּת֖וֹ <sup>4546 </sup> <n>in his path</n> יֵֽלֵכ֑וּן <sup>1980 </sup> <n>march</n> וּבְעַ֥ד <sup>1157 </sup> <n>through</n> הַשֶּׁ֛לַח <sup>7973 </sup> <n>upon the sword</n> יִפֹּ֖לוּ <sup>5307 </sup> <n>and [when] they fall</n> לֹ֥א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> יִבְצָֽעוּ׃ <sup>1214 </sup> <n>they shall not be wounded</n>
9: בָּעִ֣יר <sup>5892 </sup> <n>in the city</n> יָשֹׁ֗קּוּ <sup>8264 </sup> <n>They shall run to and fro</n> בַּֽחוֹמָה֙ <sup>2346 </sup> <n>upon the wall</n> יְרֻצ֔וּן <sup>7323 </sup> <n>they shall run</n> בַּבָּתִּ֖ים <sup>1004 </sup> <n>upon the houses</n> יַעֲל֑וּ <sup>5927 </sup> <n>they shall climb up</n> בְּעַ֧ד <sup>1157 </sup> <n>through</n> הַחַלּוֹנִ֛ים <sup>2474 </sup> <n>at the windows</n> יָבֹ֖אוּ <sup>935 </sup> <n>they shall enter in</n> כַּגַּנָּֽב׃ <sup>1590 </sup> <n>like a thief</n>
10: לְפָנָיו֙ <sup>6440 </sup> <n>before</n> רָ֣גְזָה <sup>7264 </sup> <n>shall quake</n> אֶ֔רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>The earth</n> רָעֲשׁ֖וּ <sup>7493 </sup> <n>shall tremble</n> שָׁמָ֑יִם <sup>8064 </sup> <n>them the heavens</n> שֶׁ֤מֶשׁ <sup>8121 </sup> <n>the sun</n> וְיָרֵ֙חַ֙ <sup>3394 </sup> <n>and the moon</n> קָדָ֔רוּ <sup>6937 </sup> <n>shall be dark</n> וְכוֹכָבִ֖ים <sup>3556 </sup> <n>and the stars</n> אָסְפ֥וּ <sup>622 </sup> <n>shall withdraw</n> נָגְהָֽם׃ <sup>5051 </sup> <n>their shining</n>
11: וַֽיהוָ֗ה <sup>3069 </sup> <n>God</n> נָתַ֤ן <sup>5414 </sup> <n>shall utter</n> קוֹלוֹ֙ <sup>6963 </sup> <n>his voice</n> לִפְנֵ֣י <sup>6440 </sup> <n>before</n> חֵיל֔וֹ <sup>2426 </sup> <n>army</n> כִּ֣י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>Surely</n> רַ֤ב <sup>7227 </sup> <n>great</n> מְאֹד֙ <sup>3966 </sup> <n>[is] very</n> מַחֲנֵ֔הוּ <sup>4264 </sup> <n>for his camp</n> כִּ֥י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>is indeed</n> עָצ֖וּם <sup>6099 </sup> <n>for [he is] strong</n> עֹשֵׂ֣ה <sup>6213 </sup> <n>that executeth</n> דְבָר֑וֹ <sup>1697 </sup> <n>his word</n> כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>Surely</n> גָד֧וֹל <sup>1419 </sup> <n>[is] great</n> יוֹם־ <sup>3117 </sup> <n>for the day</n> יְהוָ֛ה <sup>3069 </sup> <n>God</n> וְנוֹרָ֥א <sup>3372 </sup> <n>terrible</n> מְאֹ֖ד <sup>3966 </sup> <n>and very</n> וּמִ֥י <sup>4310 </sup> <n>can</n> יְכִילֶֽנּוּ׃ <sup>3557 </sup> <n>and who can abide</n>
12: וְגַם־ <sup>1571 </sup> <n>even</n> עַתָּה֙ <sup>6258 </sup> <n>now</n> נְאֻם־ <sup>5002 </sup> <n>Therefore also now saith</n> יְהוָ֔ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>the LORD</n> שֻׁ֥בוּ <sup>7725 </sup> <n>turn</n> עָדַ֖י <sup>5704 </sup> <n>with</n> בְּכָל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> לְבַבְכֶ֑ם <sup>3824 </sup> <n>ye [even] to me with all your heart</n> וּבְצ֥וֹם <sup>6685 </sup> <n>and with fasting</n> וּבְבְכִ֖י <sup>1065 </sup> <n>and with weeping</n> וּבְמִסְפֵּֽד׃ <sup>4553 </sup> <n>and with mourning</n>
13: וְקִרְע֤וּ <sup>7167 </sup> <n>And rend</n> לְבַבְכֶם֙ <sup>3824 </sup> <n>your heart</n> וְאַל־ <sup>408 </sup> <n>and not</n> בִּגְדֵיכֶ֔ם <sup>899 </sup> <n>and not your garments</n> וְשׁ֖וּבוּ <sup>7725 </sup> <n>and turn</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n> יְהוָ֣ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>unto the LORD</n> אֱלֹֽהֵיכֶ֑ם <sup>430 </sup> <n>your God</n> כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> חַנּ֤וּן <sup>2587 </sup> <n>for he [is] gracious</n> וְרַחוּם֙ <sup>7349 </sup> <n>and merciful</n> ה֔וּא <sup>1931 </sup> <n>he</n> אֶ֤רֶךְ <sup>750 </sup> <n>slow</n> אַפַּ֙יִם֙ <sup>639 </sup> <n>to anger</n> וְרַב־ <sup>7227 </sup> <n>and of great</n> חֶ֔סֶד <sup>2617 </sup> <n>kindness</n> וְנִחָ֖ם <sup>5162 </sup> <n>and repenteth</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and</n> הָרָעָֽה׃ <sup>7451 </sup> <n>him of the evil</n>
14: מִ֥י <sup>4310 </sup> <n>Who</n> יוֹדֵ֖עַ <sup>3045 </sup> <n>Who knoweth</n> יָשׁ֣וּב <sup>7725 </sup> <n>[if] he will return</n> וְנִחָ֑ם <sup>5162 </sup> <n>and repent</n> וְהִשְׁאִ֤יר <sup>7604 </sup> <n>and leave</n> אַֽחֲרָיו֙ <sup>310 </sup> <n>behind</n> בְּרָכָ֔ה <sup>1293 </sup> <n>a blessing</n> מִנְחָ֣ה <sup>4503 </sup> <n>him [even] a meat offering</n> וָנֶ֔סֶךְ <sup>5262 </sup> <n>and a drink offering</n> לַיהוָ֖ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>unto the LORD</n> אֱלֹהֵיכֶֽם׃ <sup>430 </sup> <n>angels</n> פ

17: בֵּ֤ין <sup>996 </sup> <n>between</n> הָאוּלָם֙ <sup>197 </sup> <n>between the porch</n> וְלַמִּזְבֵּ֔חַ <sup>4196 </sup> <n>and the altar</n> יִבְכּוּ֙ <sup>1058 </sup> <n>weep</n> הַכֹּ֣הֲנִ֔ים <sup>3548 </sup> <n>Let the priests</n> מְשָׁרְתֵ֖י <sup>8334 </sup> <n>the ministers</n> יְהוָ֑ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>of the LORD</n> וְֽיֹאמְר֞וּ <sup>559 </sup> <n>and let them say</n> ח֧וּסָה <sup>2347 </sup> <n>Spare</n> יְהוָ֣ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>O LORD</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and</n> עַמֶּ֗ךָ <sup>5971 </sup> <n>thy people</n> וְאַל־ <sup>408 </sup> <n>not</n> תִּתֵּ֨ן <sup>5414 </sup> <n>and give</n> נַחֲלָתְךָ֤ <sup>5159 </sup> <n>not thine heritage</n> לְחֶרְפָּה֙ <sup>2781 </sup> <n>to reproach</n> לִמְשָׁל־ <sup>4910 </sup> <n>should rule over</n> בָּ֣ם גּוֹיִ֔ם <sup>1471 </sup> <n>that the heathen</n> לָ֚מָּה <sup>4100 </sup> <n>Why</n> יֹאמְר֣וּ <sup>559 </sup> <n>them wherefore should they say</n> בָֽעַמִּ֔ים <sup>5971 </sup> <n>among the people</n> אַיֵּ֖ה <sup>346 </sup> <n>Where</n> אֱלֹהֵיהֶֽם׃ <sup>430 </sup> <n>angels</n>
18: וַיְקַנֵּ֥א <sup>7065 </sup> <n>be jealous</n> יְהוָ֖ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>Then will the LORD</n> לְאַרְצ֑וֹ <sup>776 </sup> <n>for his land</n> וַיַּחְמֹ֖ל <sup>2550 </sup> <n>and pity</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>on</n> עַמּֽוֹ׃ <sup>5971 </sup> <n>his people</n>
19: וַיַּ֨עַן <sup>6030 </sup> <n>will answer</n> יְהוָ֜ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>Yea the LORD</n> וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <sup>559 </sup> <n>and say</n> לְעַמּ֗וֹ <sup>5971 </sup> <n>unto his people</n> הִנְנִ֨י <sup>2005 </sup> <n>I am going</n> שֹׁלֵ֤חַ <sup>7971 </sup> <n>Behold I will send</n> לָכֶם֙ אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> הַדָּגָן֙ <sup>1715 </sup> <n>you corn</n> וְהַתִּיר֣וֹשׁ <sup>8492 </sup> <n>and wine</n> וְהַיִּצְהָ֔ר <sup>3323 </sup> <n>and oil</n> וּשְׂבַעְתֶּ֖ם <sup>7646 </sup> <n>and ye shall be satisfied</n> אֹת֑וֹ <sup>854 </sup> <n>and I</n> וְלֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>will never</n> אֶתֵּ֨ן <sup>5414 </sup> <n>therewith and I will no more make</n> אֶתְכֶ֥ם <sup>853 </sup> ע֛וֹד <sup>5750 </sup> <n>again</n> חֶרְפָּ֖ה <sup>2781 </sup> <n>you a reproach</n> בַּגּוֹיִֽם׃ <sup>1471 </sup> <n>among the heathen</n>
20: וְֽאֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> הַצְּפוֹנִ֞י <sup>6830 </sup> <n>from you the northern</n> אַרְחִ֣יק <sup>7368 </sup> <n>But I will remove far off</n> מֵעֲלֵיכֶ֗ם <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and I</n> וְהִדַּחְתִּיו֮ <sup>5080 </sup> <n>[army] and will drive</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>about</n> אֶ֣רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>him into a land</n> צִיָּ֣ה <sup>6723 </sup> <n>barren</n> וּשְׁמָמָה֒ <sup>8077 </sup> <n>and desolate</n> אֶת־ <sup>854 </sup> <n>and its</n> פָּנָ֗יו <sup>6440 </sup> <n>with his face</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>about</n> הַיָּם֙ <sup>3220 </sup> <n>sea</n> הַקַּדְמֹנִ֔י <sup>6931 </sup> <n>toward the east</n> וְסֹפ֖וֹ <sup>5490 </sup> <n>and his hinder part</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>about</n> הַיָּ֣ם <sup>3220 </sup> <n>sea</n> הָאַֽחֲר֑וֹן <sup>314 </sup> <n>toward the utmost</n> וְעָלָ֣ה <sup>5927 </sup> <n>shall come up</n> בָאְשׁ֗וֹ <sup>889 </sup> <n>and his stink</n> וְתַ֙עַל֙ <sup>5927 </sup> <n>shall come up</n> צַחֲנָת֔וֹ <sup>6709 </sup> <n>and his ill savour</n> כִּ֥י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> הִגְדִּ֖יל <sup>1431 </sup> <n>great things</n> לַעֲשֽׂוֹת׃ <sup>6213 </sup> <n>because he hath done</n>
21: אַל־ <sup>408 </sup> <n>not</n> תִּֽירְאִ֖י <sup>3372 </sup> <n>Fear</n> אֲדָמָ֑ה <sup>127 </sup> <n>not O land</n> גִּ֣ילִי <sup>1523 </sup> <n>be glad</n> וּשְׂמָ֔חִי <sup>8055 </sup> <n>and rejoice</n> כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> הִגְדִּ֥יל <sup>1431 </sup> <n>great things</n> יְהוָ֖ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>for the LORD</n> לַעֲשֽׂוֹת׃ <sup>6213 </sup> <n>will do</n>

23: וּבְנֵ֣י <sup>1121 </sup> <n>then ye children</n> צִיּ֗וֹן <sup>6726 </sup> <n>of Zion</n> גִּ֤ילוּ <sup>1523 </sup> <n>Be glad</n> וְשִׂמְחוּ֙ <sup>8055 </sup> <n>and rejoice</n> בַּיהוָ֣ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>in the LORD</n> אֱלֹֽהֵיכֶ֔ם <sup>430 </sup> <n>your God</n> כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> נָתַ֥ן <sup>5414 </sup> <n>for he hath given</n> לָכֶ֛ם אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> הַמּוֹרֶ֖ה <sup>4175 </sup> <n>you the former rain</n> לִצְדָקָ֑ה <sup>6666 </sup> <n>moderately</n> וַיּ֣וֹרֶד <sup>3381 </sup> <n>and he will cause to come down</n> לָכֶ֗ם גֶּ֛שֶׁם <sup>1653 </sup> <n>for you the rain</n> מוֹרֶ֥ה <sup>4175 </sup> <n>the former rain</n> וּמַלְק֖וֹשׁ <sup>4456 </sup> <n>and the latter rain</n> בָּרִאשֽׁוֹן׃ <sup>7223 </sup> <n>in the first</n>
24: וּמָלְא֥וּ <sup>4390 </sup> <n>shall be full</n> הַגֳּרָנ֖וֹת <sup>1637 </sup> <n>And the floors</n> בָּ֑ר <sup>1250 </sup> <n>of wheat</n> וְהֵשִׁ֥יקוּ <sup>7783 </sup> <n>shall overflow</n> הַיְקָבִ֖ים <sup>3342 </sup> <n>and the fats</n> תִּיר֥וֹשׁ <sup>8492 </sup> <n>with wine</n> וְיִצְהָֽר׃ <sup>3323 </sup> <n>and oil</n>
25: וְשִׁלַּמְתִּ֤י <sup>7999 </sup> <n>And I will restore</n> לָכֶם֙ אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> הַשָּׁנִ֔ים <sup>8141 </sup> <n>to you the years</n> אֲשֶׁר֙ <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> אָכַ֣ל <sup>398 </sup> <n>hath eaten</n> הָֽאַרְבֶּ֔ה <sup>697 </sup> <n>that the locust</n> הַיֶּ֖לֶק <sup>3218 </sup> <n>the cankerworm</n> וְהֶחָסִ֣יל <sup>2625 </sup> <n>and the caterpiller</n> וְהַגָּזָ֑ם <sup>1501 </sup> <n>and the palmerworm</n> חֵילִי֙ <sup>2426 </sup> <n>army</n> הַגָּד֔וֹל <sup>1419 </sup> <n>my great</n> אֲשֶׁ֥ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>which</n> שִׁלַּ֖חְתִּי <sup>7971 </sup> <n>which I sent</n> בָּכֶֽם׃
26: וַאֲכַלְתֶּ֤ם <sup>398 </sup> <n>And ye shall eat</n> אָכוֹל֙ <sup>398 </sup> <n>in plenty</n> וְשָׂב֔וֹעַ <sup>7646 </sup> <n>and be satisfied</n> וְהִלַּלְתֶּ֗ם <sup>1984 </sup> <n>and praise</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> שֵׁ֤ם <sup>8034 </sup> <n>the name</n> יְהוָה֙ <sup>3068 </sup> <n>of the LORD</n> אֱלֹ֣הֵיכֶ֔ם <sup>430 </sup> <n>your God</n> אֲשֶׁר־ <sup>834 </sup> <n>Who</n> עָשָׂ֥ה <sup>6213 </sup> <n>that hath dealt</n> עִמָּכֶ֖ם <sup>5973 </sup> <n>with</n> לְהַפְלִ֑יא <sup>6381 </sup> <n>wondrously</n> וְלֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> יֵבֹ֥שׁוּ <sup>954 </sup> <n>be ashamed</n> עַמִּ֖י <sup>5971 </sup> <n>with you and my people</n> לְעוֹלָֽם׃ <sup>5769 </sup> <n>shall never</n>
27: וִידַעְתֶּ֗ם <sup>3045 </sup> <n>And ye shall know</n> כִּ֣י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>I am in</n> בְקֶ֤רֶב <sup>7130 </sup> <n>that I [am] in the midst</n> יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <sup>3478 </sup> <n>of Israel</n> אָ֔נִי <sup>589 </sup> <n>I</n> וַאֲנִ֛י <sup>589 </sup> <n>I</n> יְהוָ֥ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>and [that] I [am] the LORD</n> אֱלֹהֵיכֶ֖ם <sup>430 </sup> <n>your God</n> וְאֵ֣ין <sup>369 </sup> <n>and there</n> ע֑וֹד <sup>5750 </sup> <n>other</n> וְלֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> יֵבֹ֥שׁוּ <sup>954 </sup> <n>be ashamed</n> עַמִּ֖י <sup>5971 </sup> <n>and none else and my people</n> לְעוֹלָֽם׃ <sup>5769 </sup> <n>shall never</n> ס
28: וְהָיָ֣ה <sup>1961 </sup> <n>will come</n> אַֽחֲרֵי־ <sup>310 </sup> <n>And it shall come to pass afterward</n> כֵ֗ן <sup>3651 </sup> <n>this</n> אֶשְׁפּ֤וֹךְ <sup>8210 </sup> <n>[that] I will pour out</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> רוּחִי֙ <sup>7307 </sup> <n>my spirit</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>on</n> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> בָּשָׂ֔ר <sup>1320 </sup> <n>upon all flesh</n> וְנִבְּא֖וּ <sup>5012 </sup> <n>shall prophesy</n> בְּנֵיכֶ֣ם <sup>1121 </sup> <n>and your sons</n> וּבְנֽוֹתֵיכֶ֑ם <sup>1323 </sup> <n>and your daughters</n> זִקְנֵיכֶם֙ <sup>2205 </sup> <n>your old men</n> חֲלֹמ֣וֹת <sup>2492 </sup> <n>shall dream</n> יַחֲלֹמ֔וּן <sup>2472 </sup> <n>dreams</n> בַּח֣וּרֵיכֶ֔ם <sup>970 </sup> <n>your young men</n> חֶזְיֹנ֖וֹת <sup>2384 </sup> <n>visions</n> יִרְאֽוּ׃ <sup>7200 </sup> <n>shall see</n>
